head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KEEGAN, SR. ANNE (FORMERLY MOTHER MARY CELSUS)

identified-content.person: KEEGAN, SR. ANNE (FORMERLY MOTHER MARY CELSUS)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KEEGAN, SR. ANNE (FORMERLY MOTHER MARY CELSUS)

block.p: KEEGAN-Sr. Anne (formerly Mother Mary Celsus). May 15, 2000. Taught in NYC area for 55 years. Survived by three sisters, Marguerite, Elizabeth and Helen. Funeral services New Sharon, 1341 Montgomery Ave., Rosemont, PA, Friday, May 19, 8:30AM.
